name: talk-platform-engineering
description: Platform Engineering: A Practical Guide to the Cloud-Native Toolkit

scripts.build: npm run build-webpack && npm run build-pdf
scripts.build-pdf: decktape reveal -p 10 --headless=true --chrome-arg=--allow-file-access-from-files --pdf-author='Tim Ebert' --pdf-title='Platform Engineering: A Practical Guide to the Cloud-Native Toolkit' 'dist/index.html?export-pdf' dist/slides.pdf

author: Tim Ebert
